title: Episode 17: Earning Profits is Your Social Responsibility
itunes:title: Episode 17: Earning Profits is Your Social Responsibility
description: We tend to demonize people who make money – how dare they have more than us? But that negative reaction forgets the voluntary role we play in profit-making every day. This week in Words and Numbers, Antony Davies and James R. Harrigan discuss just how good it is to earn a profit, and the vital difference between that and forcing money from people.
